title: Escape the Nautiloid
tags: find a way off the nautiloid
content:
ind a way off the Nautiloid

We've been abducted by mind flayers and infected with some kind of parasite. We need to find a way off this ship.

We met one of the mind flayers' minions - an intellect devourer. It wants us to go to the helm of the ship.

Connect the nerves of the transponder.

The mind flayer told us we need to connect the nerves of the transponder to escape Hell. We escaped Hell on the Nautiloid.

How to unlock Escape the Nautiloid

Escape the Nautiloid is the starting Quest in B
